name: Western Frontier
description:
The year is 2020, evil robots are taking over what’s left of the Wild West of America, one of the few gunslingers that remains is Ammiras Washington Perch, the only man capable of saving the land of the free. The evil corporations of America are trying to tame the wild west using robots who have taken out almost all the gunslingers left in the country, but the robots end up going rogue. Ammiras must take down the robot army and save his home and the only place he belongs. Western Frontier is a 2D side scroller in which the player must fight against the evil robot army and defeat them once and for all. 

This game is still in early development so any feedback is appreciated. Thanks!
